name: magic wonder circle
description:
a fun tool? that i whipped up in a day. tells 'fortunes' and gives you random words to inspire you, or something. try asking dumb questions with your friends and get waaacky answers.
controls: press 1 or 2 to switch modes. mode 1 is'8ball mode', mode 2 is the word generator. press space to generate stuff.

content warning: contains the SEX word!!! 

(note: love2d is required on mac and linux. a .exe file is in the download, but yknow, that basically only works on windows, so)
